title: Sans-Serif Suggestions for display, captions and headers
content:
Dear Community,

I’m designing a brochure for a Fair Trade coffee company and am looking for typeface suggestions. The tone of the design will lean towards open, airy, organic, slightly quirky... The audience may be relatively wide (packaged coffee buyers in North America) but a core group will be socially minded, activist, west coast Canadians.

Thanks in advance for your input.

Cheers,  
Rich
author: richfarr

comments.content:
It would help if you had some kinda visual.

Guerrizmo+Design
Unfortunately, no visual yet. I’m really at the beginning stages and am collecting ideas.

I like your Fair Trade coffee idea, Im a big coffee lover. Im like the Italians, I cannot start my day without a cup of mud.

Guerrizmo+Design
I think many of [Suitcase](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722104811/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/suitcase/)’s fonts fit your description.
Something from [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722104811/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=fonts)? I don’t mean Fakir ;), _Auto_ for example.
